features: WORKS FOR iPhone SE 2020 2nd/2022 3rd Generation iPhone 7/8/6s/6 (4.7 inch Screen only,NOT for Plus) . 0.25mm tempered glass screen protector. Featuring maximum protection from scratches, scrapes, and bumps.

Specialty: The iPhone SE 2020 2nd/2022 3rd Generation, iPhone 8,7,6s,6, 4.7-Inch, screens have curved edges that the screen protectors could not cover entirely of the screen, as they would peel over time and shorten the service life. Ailun screen protector is specially designed so it covers maximum area of the flat screen surface with great durability. HD ultra-clear rounded glass for The iPhone SE 2nd/3rd Generation iPhone 8/7/6/6s(4.7 Inch Screen) is 99.99% touch-screen accurate.
99.99% High-definition clear hydrophobic and oleophobic screen coating protects against sweat and oil residue from fingerprints.
It is 100% brand new,Precise laser cut tempered glass,no front camera cutout, exquisitely polished,2.5D rounded edges.
Easiest Installation - removing dust and aligning it properly before actual installation,no worrying about bubbles,enjoy your screen as if it wasn't there.

1. The flexibility of the glass screen protector is the same as the plastic material, is it tempered glass or plastic? This screen protector is a real tempered glass. The plastic flexibility is the exact reason why we call it tempered glass screen protector. Tempered glass is a type of safety glass that is stronger than ordinary glass. 2. It cannot be seen from the appearance that it is glass or plastic. As a customer, what can we do to identify it? There is an easy, quick, cost-effective way to test it yourself, and it's very accurate. Most plastics have a melting point between 160 and 210 degrees Celsius, and glass materials are at least over 1400 degrees Celsius, so is there a lighter around? 3. Does it come with a cleaning wipe to use prior to placing on the phone? Yes, the package includes: Guide Stickers, Wet Wipe & Dry Wipe, Dust Absorber. 4. How can I remove bubbles? Use the kit in the package to clean the screen before placing the screen protector. If there are bubbles,try to gently press the bubbles with your finger or with a ruler,but the screen surface needs a thin cloth pad to avoid scratching the protector. 5. How can I remove a cracked glass screen protector? Lift the screen protector with the card from any corner of the screen protector, then hold the corner and remove slowly. (If you find CHIP or CRACK on the screen protector, for your safety, please wear gloves when removing the screen protector.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Somewhat easy to install. Sturdy construction.
reviews.reviewText: Comes with three glass screens, wet and dry wipes, dust remover stickers and guide stickers. The guide stickers were the only things that didn't work as promised but the rest works perfectly. Seemed fairly easy to install. Had to quickly peel up and reset to remove bubbles but it was easy enough. Seems very thick and sturdy but had no problems with the touch sensitivity or anything. I would repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, great protection that won’t cost you an arm and a leg! I used my first one for a year and a half before having to replace it with #2 out of 3. It had some small cracks in the corners before replacement, but not enough to bother me and they did not jeopardize the integrity of the screen cover. I would recommend this to anyone and I definitely will purchase this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just installed on my wife's se2020. Fit perfect, Install is a little scary but it went smoothly. You really have to pay attention and use the tabs they give you, once it touches - it's on. Went perfectly, moved a little but it is fine. No bubbles at all. You start where the glass touches in the middle and run your finger up(or Down) then from center push out to the edges. It does feel thinner than the original one, but we are not hard on our phones. Then I installed one on my i6s, had to remove the plastic screen from the otterbox first. Again, it went fine, no bubbles. What a difference from the old plastic. Both Camera's work fine.Phones and Cases needed a good cleaning first. Will update if I have an issue. Installed 2/9/24

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It works to protect the screen
reviews.reviewText: Within a couple of weeks it cracked on one each, though the crack goes across the screen. I haven't replaced it yet, so still usable. It is easy to install and works well to protect the screen. It fit my new iphone SE fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: They are easy to apply and fit great! They didn’t peel up on the corners and seem to be durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flawless Protection with Ailun Screen Protector!
reviews.reviewText: I couldn't be happier with the Ailun Screen Protector for my iPhone! This product has exceeded all my expectations and has become an essential accessory that I can't imagine living without.First and foremost, the ease of application is truly remarkable. The kit includes everything I need for a seamless installation - from the cleaning cloth to the alignment stickers. The step-by-step instructions made the process a breeze, and the protector adhered perfectly to my screen without any bubbles or misalignment.The scratch-resistant feature is a game-changer. In a world where our phones are subjected to daily wear and tear, having a reliable screen protector is crucial. The Ailun Screen Protector has proven to be highly effective in safeguarding my iPhone's screen from scratches, smudges, and even minor impacts.What sets this screen protector apart is its ability to maintain the sleek and vibrant appearance of my iPhone. The crystal-clear clarity of the protector ensures that my phone's display remains as sharp and vivid as the day I unboxed it. It's almost like having an invisible shield that doesn't compromise the visual experience.I appreciate that the screen protector doesn't interfere with touch sensitivity or screen responsiveness. It's as if the protector becomes a seamless extension of the original screen, allowing me to use my iPhone with the same precision and speed.In terms of value, the Ailun Screen Protector is a true winner. It offers premium protection at a fraction of the cost of potential screen repairs or replacements. The pack includes multiple protectors, giving me peace of mind that I have backups ready in case I ever need them.In conclusion, the Ailun Screen Protector is a must-have for any iPhone user seeking top-notch protection without sacrificing style and functionality. Its easy installation, scratch resistance, and sleek appearance make it a standout choice. I'm genuinely thrilled with this screen protector and wholeheartedly recommend it to fellow iPhone enthusiasts. It's undoubtedly earned its five-star rating in my book!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality + how to place it
reviews.reviewText: I followed a tutorial from YouTube for perfect placement. Basically you lay the protector on the phone to align it (don't peel yet) and use 3 of the included stickers to attach it to the right side of the phone. Then flip the protector to the right (like opening a book). Clean the phone screen and remove all lint. Then slowly peel the plastic and flip the protector back onto the phone (like closing a book). Worked really well for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent screen protector for the price
reviews.reviewText: There are many screen protectors out there, and generally speaking, I haven’t been able to tell a big difference from one to the others as far as protection goes. What I have seen a difference in is in the ease of application, reduction in screen bubbles, or some enhanced features like screen privacy.This screen is a basic screen and, for the price, it seems to be a good screen.As far as any enhanced features, this screen does not have viewing angle privacy or any additional screen application features like a cradle. The directions aren’t that great either - they don’t tell you how to use the screen guide stickers: If you have applied these before, you know that you can use them as either hinges or as levers to move the glass into place without touching the sticky screen while maneuvering. This can be tricky - and the more careful and precise you are with the screen preparation (cleaning, etc.) and positioning, the less likely you are to have a crooked protector or bubbles. That being said, I used 4 stickers as a hinge and still ended up with some bubbles.One other point about the box. The box has an “easy open” tab. I wouldn’t say it was easier than others I have purchased, but it is on the box. One thing I would say is that because of how this opens, it makes for less optimal storage of the remaining 2 screen protectors as the box can no longer close (see photo). Maybe not a big deal, but something to consider.The bottom line is that if you are looking for a decent screen protector for the price and have applied these before, this should work fine. If you have had trouble applying protectors or are a bit of a perfectionist, I would suggest buying one that has included guides or carriers that facilitate applying the screen protector.
